text: Vålerenga Fotball is a Norwegian football club from Oslo. It was founded in 1913. During the 2024-season, they are playing at the second level. During the 2025-season, they are scheduled to play at the top level (in Norway), according to media.https://www.nrk.no/sport/valerenga-fikk-hjelp-av-rivalen-_- rykket-opp-til-eliteserien-1.17067928. Retrieved 2024-10-03 They are named after the neighbourhood of Vålerenga. They finished as runners-up in the 2010 Norwegian Premier League, the last time they won was in 2005. Vålerenga's home ground is Ullevaal Stadion, the national stadium for Norway. == Earlier squad == As of January 15th 2010 === Out on loan === ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * VPN (Vålerenga På Nett) * Klanen, the Vålerenga fan club Category:Norwegian football clubs Category:Organizations based in Oslo Category:1913 establishments in Europe Category:1910s establishments in Norway
title: Vålerenga Fotball
